properties.description: Jitterbit is a private enterprise SaaS company specializing in AI-powered automation, data orchestration, and low-code integration platforms. It employs 280 staff, with 3.2% annual growth, and reports $41.3M in yearly revenue; founded in 2003 and based in Alameda, California. The firm has raised $50M in funding and has received multiple industry awards in 2024, including for its integration platform and new product innovations.

Promotion for New Customers
## Harmony AI Bundle
**The Jitterbit Harmony AI Bundle brings together intelligent automation and agentic AI for secure, scalable AI deployment with expert support.**
* Full access to the unified, low-code**Jitterbit Harmony platform**
* One pre-built, enterprise-hardened**AI agent**(or the option to build custom agents)
* **AI assistants**to unleash the full potential of intelligent automation
* **60 hours**of Jitterbit Agentic AI Professional Services to help ensure successful deployment
*[Additional bundles](/promotions/)available for existing iPaaS and App Builder customers.*
![Default Image](/wp-content/uploads/harmony-ai-bundle-badge.png)
[Download the Bundle Guide](https://www.jitterbit.com/wp-content/uploads/Jitterbit-Harmony-AI-Bundle-Solution-Sheet.pdf)
[Contact an AI Expert](https://www.jitterbit.com/contact-us/)
## See Jitterbit iPaaS in action.
[Schedule a Demo](https://www.jitterbit.com/get-a-demo/)
## G2 once again names Jitterbit #1 for enterprise iPaaS implementation.
Jitterbit has done it again: In G2‚Äôs Fall 2025 Enterprise Implementation Index for iPaaS,**Jitterbit was ranked #1**for the**second consecutive quarter**and beat the average score across the board. Scores are based on criteria like customer satisfaction with the setup process, time to go-live, user adoption percentage, implementation method and more ‚Äîall as reported by actual users.
For more on how Jitterbit fared against competing iPaaS providers, check out the full Index on the G2 site.
[Learn More](https://www.jitterbit.com/blog/back-to-back-jitterbit-ranks-no-1-again-for-enterprise-implementation/)
[See the Full Index](https://www.g2.com/reports/enterprise-implementation-index-for-ipaas-fall-2025.embed?featured=jitterbit&secure[gated_consumer]=7d01bc0c-42c9-4e74-9113-0d410ac711c3&secure[token]=6fd1cf913b234a77a8527db99814dcd69ca862cc4347989843bb88e860ea26b0&utm_campaign=gate-2125968)

company.name: Jitterbit
company.about:
üèÜ 2024 SIIA CODiE Award for ‚ÄúBest Integration Platform as a Service,‚Äù Harmony Platform
üèÜ 2024 Gold Stevie Award for ‚ÄúNew Product of the Year ‚Äì Business Technology,‚Äù Jitterbit EDI
üèÜ 2024 Bronze Stevie Award for ‚ÄúBusiness Technology,‚Äù Jitterbit App Builder

For organizations ready to modernize and innovate, Jitterbit provides a unified AI-infused low-code platform for integration, orchestration, automation, and app development that accelerates business transformation, boosts productivity, and unlocks value.

The Jitterbit Harmony platform, including iPaaS, API Manager, App Builder and EDI, future-proofs operations, simplifies complexity and drives innovation for organizations globally. 

With the infusion of AI across the platform, your organization can adopt AI capabilities at your own pace ‚Äî without being forced into a solution you might not need or be ready for.

Learn more about accelerating business transformation with intelligent automation at www.jitterbit.com.

evaluations.reasoning: The company has 280 employees, which falls within the required range of between 201 and 500

evaluations.criterion: Company is headquartered in the United States
evaluations.reasoning: The company is based in United States of America

references.title: Jitterbit
references.snippet:
Jitterbit is a Software Development company (private) with 280 employees (+3.2% YoY growth), $41.3M annual revenue, founded in 2003, headquartered in Alameda, California, United States. Has $50.0M in total funding, last round was a Private Equity Round in 2020-11-17, previously had 9 funding rounds. references.title: Enterprise iPaaS: Low-Code Integration Platform - Jitterbit
references.snippet: Jitterbit's low-code iPaaS platform offers a flexible, cost-effective way to connect systems, automate processes, and scale your business.
